items.name: Pickaxes
items.description: Used to mine stone blocks and ores.
items.ingredients: Sticks & Wooden Planks or Cobblestone or Iron Ingots or Gold Ingots or Diamonds

items.name: Axes
items.description: Used to chop wood blocks faster than by hand.
items.ingredients: Sticks & Wooden Planks or Cobblestone or Iron Ingots or Gold Ingots or Diamonds

items.name: Shovels
items.description: Used to dig sand, gravel, dirt, grass and snow faster than by hand.
items.ingredients: Sticks & Wooden Planks or Cobblestone or Iron Ingots or Gold Ingots or Diamonds

items.name: Hoes
items.description: Used to till dirt blocks in preparation for growing crops.
items.ingredients: Sticks & Wooden Planks or Cobblestone or Iron Ingots or Gold Ingots or Diamonds

items.name: Clock
items.description: Displays the time relative to the positions of the sun and moon.

items.name: Bucket
items.description: Used to transport water, lava and milk.

items.name: Shears
items.description: Used to collect wool from sheep and leaves from trees.
